Hi! I'm [user 1's name].
What do you do for fun?
I like to play video games too! I'm not much of a reader, though.
I like to play a lot of different games, but I'm really into competitive online games right now.
That's cool. What kind of relaxing games do you like to play?
I've never been much of a puzzle game person, but I do like simulation games and story-based games.
I like Stardew Valley a lot. It's a farming game, but it's also really relaxing and fun.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
That would be fun!
Ok, sounds good.
Hi [user 1's name], I'm [user 2's name].
I like to play video games, go to the beach, and read.
What video games do you like to play?
I'm not really into competitive games, I like to play more relaxing games.
I like to play puzzle games, simulation games, and story-based games.
Nice! What's your favorite simulation game?
I've heard good things about that game. I might have to check it out.
Well, I'm glad we met. Maybe we can play some games together sometime.
Great! I'll send you my Steam name.
Hey, how's it going?
Nice. Me too. I'm playing video games.
I'm playing Call of Duty: Warzone.
It's a battle royale game. You drop into a map with 150 other players and you have to be the last one standing.
You should. It's a lot of fun.
I like to watch movies and TV shows.
I like action movies and TV shows. I also like comedy movies and TV shows.
So, what are some of your favorite movies and TV shows?
Me too! I love the Fast and Furious movies and the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
I love The Walking Dead. I also love Game of Thrones.
So, what are you doing this weekend?
I'm not sure either. Maybe we could hang out?
Great! I'll call you later to set up a time.
Good, I'm just hanging out.
Oh, cool. I like video games. What are you playing?
Oh, I've never played that one. What's it like?
Oh, that sounds fun. I'll have to check it out.
So, what else do you like to do?
Me too. What kind of movies and TV shows do you like?
Me too. I love action movies and TV shows.
I love the Fast and Furious movies. I also love the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
What are your favorite TV shows?
Me too! I love The Walking Dead and Game of Thrones.
I'm not sure yet. What are you doing?
That sounds fun. Let's do it.
Hi, my name is John. What's your name?
It's nice to meet you, Mary. What do you do for a living?
That's really cool. I've always wanted to do some volunteer work, but I've never had the time.
I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
I like to play video games. I'm a huge gamer.
I like to play all kinds of games, but I'm mostly into RPGs and strategy games.
I know, right? They're the best.
I like to play a lot of different games, but some of my favorites are the Elder Scrolls series, the Fallout series, and Civilization.
Me too! They're so good.
I love the open world and the freedom to do whatever you want.
Yeah, it's the best.
I love to explore the world and find new things. I also love to do quests and side quests.
Yeah, they're so much fun.
I think my favorite quest is the one where you have to go to the Soul Cairn.
Yeah, it was so cool.
I love the atmosphere. It's so creepy and eerie.
Yeah, it's the best.
Hi, John, my name is Mary.
I do volunteer work for human rights organizations.
You should definitely look into it! It's a great way to give back to the community.
No problem. So, what do you do for fun?
Oh, that's cool. I like to play video games too. What games do you like to play?
Me too! I love RPGs and strategy games. They're so much fun to play.
So, what are some of your favorite games?
Oh, I love the Elder Scrolls series! I've played all of them.
So, what do you like about them?
Me too! I love that you can just explore and do whatever you want.
So, what are some of your favorite things to do in the Elder Scrolls games?
Me too! I love doing quests and side quests.
So, what's your favorite quest in the Elder Scrolls games?
Oh, that's a good one. I loved that quest too.
So, what's your favorite thing about the Soul Cairn?
Me too! I love the atmosphere.
Hi!
What's up?
Cool. What do you like to do for fun?
Nice. I like to write, watch YouTube videos, and listen to music.
I write poetry, short stories, and essays.
You should try! It's a lot of fun.
You don't have to be good enough. Just start writing and see what happens.
Cool. So, what do you want to do after we graduate?
I know what you mean. I'm also ready for a change.
That would be cool! We could be roommates.
So, what are we waiting for? Let's go pack our bags!

properties.content: I don t like my reputation.

utterances: Hey!
Not much. Just hanging out.
I like to watch YouTube videos, go to concerts, and read.
What do you write?
That's cool. I've always wanted to write a book.
I'm not sure if I'm good enough.
I'll think about it.
I want to move to a new city. I'm tired of living in this one.
Maybe we can move to the same city.
That would be fun!
Haha, okay! I'm ready!
Hello!
What do you like to do for fun?
Oh, that's great! I love to swim and go shopping too.
That would be fun! What's your favorite store?
Oh, I love that store! I always find great clothes there.
What kind of clothes do you like to wear?
Me too! I love how comfortable they are.
I know, right? I love running. It's so relaxing.
I know, right? I love how I feel after I've run.
I know, right? I love waking up early and going for a run.
Hi!
I love to spend time with my family, go running, and shop.
That's awesome! We should go shopping sometime.
My favorite store is American Eagle.
Me too! They have a great selection of clothes.
I like to wear casual clothes, like jeans and t-shirts.
Me too! They're perfect for running.
Me too! It's a great way to get in shape.
Me too! It's a great way to start your day.
Me too! It's the best way to start the day.
Hi, how are you doing? I'm getting ready to do some cheetah chasing to stay in shape.
I am! For my hobby I like to do canning or some whittling.
That's neat. When I was in high school I placed 6th in 100m dash!
I do not. But I do have a favorite meat since that is all I eat exclusively.
I would have to say its prime rib. Do you have any favorite foods?
Do you have anything planned for today? I think I am going to do some canning.
I think I will can some jam. Do you also play footfall for fun?
Did you get to do any bow hunting lately?
Running is going fine. I am preparing for the marathon currently. This will be my first marathon so need to really prepare.
As it's my first, anything below 4 hours I will be happy with. What animals did you go hunting for so far?
Unfortunately I never had that in my life. But would love to try. How about you? Do you like it?
I love meat, that's my favourite food. My wife likes chicken so it's mostly chicken in the house. My wife's recipe, thai chicken with rice is fantastic. What about you? What's your favourite food?
I cook only during weekends, no energy left after work. But my wife cooks almost every day. You need to send me the recipe for jerk chicken.
I tried that jerk chicken recipe you sent me, it was very good!
That sounds awesome, I do love to eat a lot of meat! Wife wants to try making jerk prime rib, which I think would be pure awesome
Not recently, I've had to take a pause on my running. I slipped and broke my ankle 5 days ago :(
I was told 4-6 weeks to recover, but that's ok, I can get some whittling done without having to move around much. Carve up a few figurines :)
Indeed! Wife said thank you for the mac and cheese too, she said it was better than hers!
I'll let her know, she'll love it!
It's hard to get around the house with a broken ankle!
Almost a week! It hurts so bad! Really? How did you broke your leg?
Oh! Well I think I´m going to the doctor tomorrow to see if my ankle is better
Basically my ankle is an smashed cookie right now. So yeah... it´s really bad
Yes! But my doctor wanted to wait a week until my ankle is okay for a surgery. Really no I´m not a good planner, what do you recommend me to do?
I love to make boats.
You must be very fast. Hunting is one of my favorite hobbies.
I also remodel homes when I am not out bow hunting.
That's awesome. Do you have a favorite season or time of year?
What is your favorite meat to eat?
I like chicken or macaroni and cheese.
I am going to watch football. What are you canning?
If I have time outside of hunting and remodeling homes. Which is not much!
No, the weather was poor, hoping to reschedule for another weekend. What have you been up to lately? How is running going?
What time are you setting for your goal?
Mostly just deer. We have been trying to get an Elk tag, but no luck yet. Do you like deer meat?
It makes good jerky, but not my favorite. What are you favorite meals?
Yah, chicken is a staple with us as well. My favorite is jerk chick with red beans and rice. I'm also a big fan of mac n' cheese. How frequently do you cook?
For sure, it's a great recipe and very easy.
Glad to hear! If youre running low on deer I can bring you some more. Also I'm planning to finally hunt for elk this weekend maybe I can bring some of that too.
That sounds like heaven! Have you hit a new PR for running recently?
Oh no that's horrible how long do they think you'll be out for?
That's not too bad still unfortunate though. Perks of having multiple hobbies for sure!
She is so kind haha I can send the recipe over if she'd like.
Great! Are you taking any time off work since you broke your ankle?
How long has it been broken? I broke my leg once a long time ago during the winter. It took forever to heal and the ice was a pain!
I fell down the steps at church one icy Sunday. Thankfully it healed up but getting groceries by bus is a pain.
How badly did you break it? Usually they take a while to heal.
Did they think you were going to need surgery? I hope it heals ok for you. Are you planning any new whittling projects while you're laid up?
I haven't whittled in a while. The last thing I made was a plain wooden cross for my home. Do you have a favorite thing to make? I'm working on a set of raised planters for my garden.
Maybe you should start a model boat kit? I love to build things. I think that I usually make functional things. I always wanted to know how to build a full size sailboat by hand.
Hi, how are you doing today?
Wow, four sisters. Just watching game of thrones.
I agree. What do you do for a living?
Interesting. I'm a website designer. Pretty much spend all my time on the computer.
That's awesome. I have always had a love for technology.
I really enjoy free diving, how about you, have any hobbies?
That's nice. Moms are pretty cool too.
I am spending time with my 4 sisters what are you up to
That is a good show I watch that while drinking iced tea
I'm a researcher I'm researching the fact that mermaids are real
That's cool my mom does the same thing
Tell me more about yourself
I enjoy hanging with my mother she's my best friend
I'm also fascinated with mermaids
whilst popping ?
you look like a nice person ! we 're proud of you , and i bet you earned that promotion !
amazing ! good job :)
nice !

harvestman . harmless .

sometimes i  m asked to judge science fairs . it  s so disappointing to see that teachers approve projects that have zero scientific merit and allow kids to waste their effort pursuing meaningless  findings .  the kids are so proud of their display and project and i  m put in the awkward position of explaining how it  s flawed . yet , if you don  t tell them , you  re no better than the adults that mislead and misinformed them .

in my opinion , you not only keep people who made these mistakes , you utilize the experience as a preventive measure . everyone screws up . you don  t manage by fear  it sends a horrible message to employees . people who make repetitive mistakes despite appropriate training and coaching , however , should be allowed to find other employment as should people who are indifferent and unapologetic about their errors . people who screw up big things usually feel horrible about it . hopefully , the hr manager will now be a cheerleader for caution and security and that may be a better outcome than replacing them .

okay , but that  s not a valid sample . results will be purely anecdotal . you may want to point that out to your teach so they know you  re aware of the faults and limitations . also , the same study found that about digit percent of shower water is from the hot water source . and if your calculating enviro footprints , don  t forget about all the embedded energy in water , both hot and cold .

don  t assume anything . ask for clarification . in my workplace , people sometimes assume they understand a vague assignment and we wind up doing unnecessary or unwanted work because someone was too shy to ask an executive some follow up questions . please , just politely and confidently ask .

okay , that sucks , but what about the thousands of items we do get undamaged ? i grouse about usps sometimes , but , overall , i think they  re amazing . if you got digit delicious meals for every bad one , would you call for the cook to be fired ?
cause and effect ? what did the dealer have to say about it ?

why do people blackout something that  s on display to the general public , anyway ? like people putting their finger over the plate on a craigslist ad ? ffs , you show your plate to thousands of people every day .
not a flea . it  s a beetle . unless you  re seeing many of them , i wouldn  t worry . pic is too grainy for much more than guesses .
indeed , i do , but i still consider them to appear to be from an episode of star trek .
some votes are accidental . i often inadvertently upvote posts because the arrow is in the area i use to scroll to view comments . nice moth !
wish i could read this without blinding myself .

does the your you ' re misunderstanding extend to their they ' re now ? is this done deliberately ? is any of this real ? send help please .
exactly my thoughts , regardless of whether you believe in god or not , this stands to be true .

how is that a good thing ?
the screeching sound of a cockroach that you can ' t locate when you ' re trying to sleep .
that ' s crazy to me because both of those names are on my list too haha

i totally agree . i ' ve noticed this a couple of times and , like you said , the reason is often a mystery . i only downvote comments that are rude or that mock someone ' s tastes  there are tactful ways to disagree with someone ! thankfully , there have only been a few of these occasions and this sub is , on the whole , a safe , friendly space to share ideas and opinions . that ' s a rare find on the internet nowadays . let ' s not spoil it . eta  i love that this whole post has turned into a whole bunch of conversations that are just spreading positivity everywhere .
glad we ' re on the same page in this technological age i think more people are looking into names and most people will check what they mean , but they ' ll always be some .

a sect ? or maybe just call it by the name of the group . i think namenerds is more about names for people or characters or pets , rather than words in general . you might have better luck on another subreddit .

i would love to use my most out  there as middles , because they might be too much as firsts , and it would get annoying dealing with questions or having to explain it , but i really do like weird names .

if you can come up with a name you both like , it would be nice if you changed it together so you have that connection even though , like you say , a name doesn ' t equal family , but it ' s a nice thing to have in common . if you ' re serious about changing your first name too , have a look at lists there are plenty online or ask around i ' m sure people here would be happy to give you suggestions . pretty soon you ' ll work out which styles and sounds you like and dislike . i ' d also recommend having a look at the top 100ish names for the year you were born and maybe a few other years from around that time as a starting point , that way you ' ll know if you want something in  keeping with your generation or something a bit more unusual .

i mean people sometimes name their kids after traits or values , like charity and patience , so it ' s not totally implausible that someone might use celibate . i personally wouldn ' t . a couple of google searches seem to suggest that this is not a thing .
thanks for explaining . i can understand employees wanting to get paid for the work they ' re doing , but that seems like a really harsh punishment for just a minute or two of time .

so i don ' t have personal experience with this yet , but i have wanted to change my name for about digit years now . i ' m about to finish college and might be moving away soon , so now seems like a pretty good time to go through with it . anyway , to answer your questions  1a as far as i can tell , most places that require a formal change e . g . your job , bank accounts , ect . are able to easily change people ' s names in their system probably because of people changing their name when they get married so that should be fairly straightforward . some places  like banks  may require proof that the name change is legal , but just show them a copy of the deed poll . please note  i live in the uk  the rules might be different where you live . 1b i ' ve found it really helpful to talk to a friend about changing my name . i told a couple of friends , but we ' ve only spoken about it on skype , never face  to  face , but recently i ' ve been talking to one of my friends about it in real life , not online , and it ' s so affirming , if that makes sense . before , i felt like it was all in my head , but having someone to talk to about it and again i emphasise a face  to  face discussion makes it feel not  weird . she ' s even offered suggestions for me . digit as far as explaining it to people goes , i haven ' t really had to fully explain my reasons to anyone . none of my friends really asked why , or if they did , they were satisfied with the ' i just hate my name and i am able to change it , so why shouldn ' t i ? ' explanation . i plan on having different ' levels ' of explanation , depending on who asks . so the first level would be ' because i want to ' which would be for acquaintances and people i don ' t know very well . then ' growing up , i really didn ' t like my name . it caused me a lot of grief , and i decided to move away from that , ' for the next level , for people i know better , and then for people i know really well and trust , the last level would be the full story , which is quite long and this message is long enough as it is but i ' m happy to share if you ' re interested . digit in the dating world , if you ' ve never met them before , just introduce yourself with your new name . they won ' t know that you were ever called anything else . you can tell them about your name change in time , but there ' s no need to do it right away . digit i mean , there ' s no limit on the number of times you can change your name that i know of anyway but if you change it too often , i think people will stop taking it seriously , or just get mixed up with which name you have at any given time . once you have a good idea of the name you want to use , try introducing yourself with it online . if your username doesn ' t have any actual names in it like mine here then you can introduce yourself with a different name to each person if you want , and just see if one feels right . when you ' re comfortable with that , try using it as a username . i ' d recommend getting people to call you the new name socially before you legally change it , so you can get used to it , and it won ' t be too much of a hassle if you change your mind . lastly , i would like to add that you ' re not a fraud . it feels weird at first and lots of people who change their name feel as if they ' re lying when they use their new name . you ' re not . you ' re used to being called one thing and now you ' re answering to something different , and that takes time to get used to . don ' t let anyone make you feel bad about it .

i think digit middle names is fine  i draw the line at digit . i think your partner ' s concerns about hurting feelings would be a bigger reason to reconsider . personally , namesakes are not my thing , but i get that they hold a lot of significance for other people . i would be cautious about using a living relative as a namesake if other people could get offended .

a little bit of everything  fantasy , short stories , screenplays , romance  but it ' s mostly aimed at a ya audience . although lately i ' ve been questioning whether i should bother . i always struggle with motivation but i have a lot of ideas that i need to get out . did you ever experience anything like that ?

utterances: call apple support ?

thanks for the info ! how did you find it in comparison to google maps api ? i read up it  s more simple to use and more cost effective . are there any other reasons besides maybe besides unawareness you think is preventing devs from adopting it for their websites ?

could not agree more ! both yelp and tripadvisor are driving me nuts with this photos and reviews thing . maybe apple can implement a system where it controls and presents its own photos  reviews whereby third parties then fill in for missing data and countries not served ? i suspect these things will come in time , including the ones you mentioned , though apple  s methodically iterative approach sometimes does take more than a while .

ok that  s actually pretty great the , means they  re integrating more and more sources . i hope they will enable linking up of various national transports to make cross border trips much easier too . maybe they feel they  ve already covered the majority of the terrain they needed to ? i  d say there  s also the issue with some transit providers simply not having any api integration . on another note , have you seen anyone take advantage of the maps extensions much yet ? i know uber was there and then they removed themselves and opentable can book tables with yelp having some integration too .

nice list though duplicating some of the requests earlier to the normal maps app . i  m sure if they bring them then they  ll bring it to both this one and the maps app . on another note , i recently submitted most of this feedback to not just the apple feedback site , but also to eddy cue as he  s the svp of maps among many other things . you might wanna do so too so it likely gets better prioritized as imho few from the teams read our postings here .

lol , if you go to the airpods in settings themselves , the a2x models are always 2nd gen , a16x are the old generation . i was myself confused by this too until i checked apple  s website . here in asia , everyone is wearing them and talking to them all the time , not awkward to do likewise at all . did you try talking louder and in continuous voice without too much background noise ? that almost always works for me . if it still doesn  t work , make sure to try to retrain her voice or resetting the id . just by getting into the habit of offloading some of the repetitive tasks to her you  ll def prepare yourself for ios digit and shortcuts automations which i  m sure will become super handy . the user guide in apple books also has some useful tips . don  t give up and keep trying , hope it works out for you as for me it  s been great so far ! smiling  face  with  smiling  eyes

agreed ! how  s the performance on other browsers ? is the api flexible enough to  recreate  apple maps but in the browser or is it restricted to being the backend ? i know with duckduckgo i provided some feedback including poor search results and lack of mouse scrolling , the latter of which they  ve added . also , do you have to pay the annual  digit fee to get access to the api key ? hopefully wwdc will provide more answers .

it really makes customer support queries much faster . i find it way more useful than some of the banking apps i use , because all the text and information is automatically saved . you don  t have to go back and forth with different systems and phone numbers and juggle all the information as it  s all there .

maybe they didn  t get around to it yet ? you can also notice some states are mentioned twice or more so it  s pretty much incomplete and i assume will expand greatly prior to end of digit as stated in the keynote .
what are they saying ? are they staging this for  applelookaround ?
i guess it really depends on the location . some places may be way worse and others way better . best we can hope for is swift rollout of the new maps .
not saying happy cake day to you .
i want to downvote these post because of how shitty this makes me feel , but i remember it ' s not the posters fault

she is violating the child ' s body by having it torn up and sucked out of her . she is using the child ' s life as a sacrifice to her convenience . yes , slavery is always wrong . in a perfect world this wouldn ' t be a problem in the first place . but in the real world i choose the lesser of two evils . taking an innocent life to prevent your own suffering is wrong . please be intellectually honest and stop using the fringe cases as an excuse to justify the common occurrence . they are definitely worth considering , but even if they were justifiable , it doesn ' t mean the others are . i am pretty sure i have heard every reason that pro  choice advocates have for abortion . and so far , they don ' t change what i see as a very simple truth . it is always morally wrong to take an innocent human life . and , though you are free to disagree with my view on morality , i can ' t think of anything worse that one person could do to another . saving innocent life  saving bodily autonomy .

i think that unborn children should also have bodily autonomy . i use the scientific definition of life , which does begin at conception . the resulting embryo has dna independent from it ' s parents . it ' s a unique , human life . i would say that life is the most important right . freedom as opposed to slavery is highly important , but you cannot have freedom if you are not alive . therefore both killing of the innocent and slavery should not be allowed by a moral people . additionally , i would like to say that the parents of a fetus have already made choices leading to the resulting baby . i think you should be responsible for your actions . if you don ' t want a baby , either don ' t have sex , or use contraceptives . then the whole issue can be avoided in the first place .

simple logic of my sense of morality . it is always wrong to take innocent human life . anyone who is not a monster agrees with that statement alone . pro  abortion people will then complicate that simple moral logic , usually by pointing out the evils that may be prevented by terminating the life of the child . but those evils are never greater than the taking of innocent human life .

i still say there is a difference between having a right and what is right . but let ' s assume for the sake of argument , that there is inconsistency in my logic . i can change my beliefs based on new information . i would therefore say that bodily autonomy is never greater than innocent life under any condition .

true love is the point where you make the decision that you will care for someone  something so much , that no matter the circumstances , you will even go as far as to sacrifice of yourself for that person  thing .

it loses it ' s bodily autonomy when it loses it ' s body . who are you to decide who ' s life is worth living ? i don ' t want women to have to suffer through an unwanted pregnancy . but i have to go with the lesser of two evils . here ' s a hypothetical thought experiment . you enter a room with a man and a baby . then the man pulls out a gun . he tells you that one of two things will happen . either you will go to prison for nine months , or he will shoot the baby in the face . what do you choose ? you could decide that you should not be imprisoned for the sake of someone else . why should it be your responsibility ? but i think it is clear that the morally right thing to do is to take care of those who cannot take care of themselves . even if you have to sacrifice of yourself for that person . i think a truly good person would willingly put their life at risk for an innocent human life .

if i woke up and found out i was sustaining your life because it would be the right thing to do . people have many rights to do wrong things , but it doesn ' t change the fact that it is wrong . having a right does not morally justify every circumstance . and there is a difference between action and inaction . taking an action to end innocent human life is always murder .
regardless , for me it is a very simple moral logic . saving innocent life  saving bodily autonomy . i want to choose lesser of two evils . and that is why i am pro  life .

you ' re right . no one should be able to force you . my point is that you should choose to do the right thing anyway . if you have the chance to do right , and you choose not to , then you have done evil through inaction . you have the right to disagree . but for me the greater evil has always been the taking of an innocent human life . i can ' t deny that an embryo is innocent human life . and that is why i am pro  life .

rifle training was once taught in school . they even had competitive shooting teams . firearms in america have been part of ordinary life for a long time . it is only recently that mass shootings have become a problem . the number of shootings is increasing , while the number of gun owners is going down . this suggests that guns are not the problem . so , what is the problem ? what changed ? is it a breakdown of family values ? or that we no longer teach civic duty and citizenship ? is society encouraging a sense of hopelessness , futility , and cynicism to the point that we devalue human life ? i don ' t really know what the answer is , but it appears that there is too much fighting for enough people to think about what it might be , in order to make a change .

last  minute entry ! kellie had been feeling kind of down , but nobody at the castle had a clue why , not even the digit problem fixers emmettthe summoner , king , prism , and stan knew why .  maybe a trip to the beach will cheer her up !  sharena suggested , the others agreeing .  if anything could cheer her up , it  s emma in a swimsuit !  prism said , the others groaning at that statement . one hour later   okay kellie , you can take off your blindfold now !  alfonse said .  i can kind of understand the blindfold , you guys did say this was a surprise , but why the tissues in my nose ?  kellie questioned , taking of the blindfold and finding the answer staring her in the face . emma , in a gorgeous bikini . the tissues immediately went red .  hey kellie ! the others told me about how you were feeling and their plan ! so , is it working ?  emma asked . kellie didn  t respond . why must i never have any ideas at the worst possible times ! well i hope you enjoyed this mini story !

i disagree to start off , kids have to do pe without choice of what they do until their second year of middle school at least from what we had and even when they finally get that chance to pick what pe they have , their parents may force them to do the sport they want for them . it isn ' t until highschool though that they can finally free up that spot in the day to have what they feel would better suit their future , for me and others that would be jrotc , and for others it would be ag or welding . once you get to highschool , you are responsible for choosing your career path , which can lead to a long day full of classes that will help you succeed in your chosen path , but you still have to complete core classes that take up valuable periods . adding another required class like pe for all four highschool years would rob the smarter teens and young adults their chance to experiment with what they feel would help them or to just make the day go by smoother . imagine having only two or three choices on what your aloud to do during your school day , most students won ' t actually use or even remember some of the things that they learn in their core classes because they will never use them in their jobs  careers . most band members have to drop out of band because they don ' t have enough free spots to do the things they love , imagine in your case i ' m assuming you enjoy sports that you had to drop out of the sport you loved because you have to do something else that someone else though would be important to you . do i think people should get exercise every day ? yes i do , i believe it ' s very important to help you succeed in life , but it should be reserved for after school when you have done the thing nessisary for your future path .

no , murder is not better than depression or poverty although when i was dealing with that crap i would have been more than happy for that . but when it comes to it actually being considered murder is a completely different subject , to me , no it ' s not murder to destroy something that cannot even be considered conscious in the first place . i do think there is a limit to how long you can wait before an abortion is performed and that time differs between person to person . but it ' s not my body , not my child , and not my choice . if someone performs an abortion passed the time i ' d think it ' s wrong , then i ' d be upset , but i would still have no say in it . and for the not getting pregnant before your ready argument , i ' d say that is very subjective as well . some people don ' t realize what they got themselves into until it ' s already happened , maybe new information came up that they didn ' t know before . health problems , relationship or even financial could very easily affect someones choice to have a child , and those things could easily pop up after you ' ve made the decision . this is even worse for younger couples like teens who have no idea what they were doing until they already made the mistake , would you rather have two or three lives ruined or would you rather they mature and become stable before taking on a task like raising a family . one of my good friends i met in the hospital , tried to kill herself because she couldn ' t handle all the pressures that came when she had a child . i ' m not saying you have to support anything you don ' t want to , but if you really wanted to help a child , then you would be better off supporting things that help single mothers , homeless children or familys in poverty . but this is all up to you , listen to me or don ' t , just know that the only person that knows what they can do is you and the same goes for them .
